page.title: 11Polypressions.(Wilminstone)
page.content: Polypressions is a business that makes plastic moulds for electric hand driers.The moulds are made out of plastic resin and reinforced with fibre glass.The plastic resin used for the moulds comes from Scotland and from Cheshire and the fibre glass comes from France or America.They have great problems getting their raw materials from their suppliers but no problems getting their product to the buyers. The person who owns the company lives at Gunnislake and has one employee who lives at Brentor.The business has been going for several years,but they have only been on this site for one month.They chose that site because the plastic resin gives off an unpleasant smell,so this is an ideal place because there are not many houses around that area.
